state.unicode: Recruitment Cost||The combined cost of recruiting this character into your faction, and of deploying the retinue as part of an army.
This is the upkeep per turn for this retinue

uientry.unicode: This character is in your faction.

state.unicode: Recruitment cost||The cost for deploying this retinue as part of an army.
This is the upkeep per turn for this retinue

uientry.unicode: This character holds an administrator position in one of your commanderies.

state.unicode: No characters are available for replacement
Only characters already in your faction are able to replace fallen generals You will lose this retinue as a result

uientry.unicode: This unit was wiped out entirely. The number in the circle indicates the number of turns it will take to muster again.
